title: Create Carbon Calculator Input Form Component

objective.i_want: to input my daily activities like transportation and food choices
objective.so_that: I can calculate and track my personal carbon emissions

acceptance_criteria.description: Form includes transportation section with mode selection (car, bus, bike, walk)
Form includes food section with meal type options (meat, vegetarian, vegan)
Form includes energy section for home electricity usage input
Form validates all inputs before submission with clear error messages
Form calculates and displays estimated emissions in real-time

stop_conditions: Never store sensitive user data in localStorage without encryption
Never commit directly to main branch
Stop if constitutional AI score drops below 0.9
Stop if form validation can be bypassed
